notes: High-end modern apartment with designer finishes including stylish light fixtures, large TV wall unit, premium wood paneling, and en-suite bathrooms. At least 3 bedrooms visible with good natural light from large windows. Baby safety concerns include the gold metallic coffee table with irregular sharp edges in the living room and floor-to-ceiling balcony windows that may need child-proofing; the listing is managed by UR HOUSE (a foreigner-friendly agency). The 3rd floor without confirmed elevator could be inconvenient with a stroller.
